Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-40550 affecting package shim-unsigned-aarch64 for versions less than 15.8-5
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-40550 affecting package shim-unsigned-aarch64 for versions less than 15.8-5. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package shim-unsigned-aarch64 is earlier than 15.8-5, affected by CVE-2023-40550
